projects: [{'title': 'Advertising campaign for Red Bull Italia', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'description': 'Group work carried out on a marketing brief assigned by Red Bull Italia. With the purpose of delivering doable advertising proposals to the company, the team worked on the upcoming launch of a new product, which would take place the following summer. Presentations and coaching sessions were scheduled every week. Started from the strategic phase, with the situational analysis (including consumer research and selection of a market segment with its variables) leading to the design of the copy strategy, the following steps focused on advertising techniques that had to be coherently implemented in our project, in order to generate original contents based on our findings and strategy. The result was a multichannel, fully integrated proposal with several telling ideas awarded with full marks.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Raffaele', 'last_name': 'Corbelli', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Data & Analytics Intern @ Riverflex | MSc Marketing Analytics & Data Science'}]}, {'title': 'PR Campaign for IULM University', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'description': "Group project consisting in a public relation campaign assigned by and delivered to IULM University's Sustainability Committee. Focused on designing and planning a sustainable initiative in Milan together with its communication, the goal was to strengthen the University's strategic positioning. The group had to take care of each phase of the process from top to bottom: strategic idea, content creation, content curation, promotion, media mix, editorial plan. Eventually the campaign proposal was assessed with full marks: 3/3 pt.", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Raffaele', 'last_name': 'Corbelli', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Data & Analytics Intern @ Riverflex | MSc Marketing Analytics & Data Science'}]}, {'title': 'Cross-Cultural Brand Awareness Campaign for A Fish Named Fred', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'description': "Completed during my stay in the Netherlands. The project was carried out by working within an international team. Its aim was the creation of a narrative content and promotion plan, with the purpose of expanding A Fish Named Fred's brand awareness among different foreign countries. The campaign had to be adapted to different cultural backgrounds. Eventually the whole proposal was presented in a meeting with the company's CEO.", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Raffaele', 'last_name': 'Corbelli', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Data & Analytics Intern @ Riverflex | MSc Marketing Analytics & Data Science'}]}]
